text.english: Teorema: Interaction between \(\texttt{rev}\) and \(\texttt{app}\) (distributivity of \(\texttt{rev}\) over \(\texttt{app}\)), i.e. \[ \forall l_1,l_2 \in L_A .\; \texttt{rev}(\texttt{app}(l_1\; l_2)) = \texttt{app}(\texttt{rev}(l_2), \texttt{rev}(l_1\;)) \]
text.italiano: Teorema: Interazione fra \(\texttt{rev}\) e \(\texttt{app}\) (distributivit√† di \(\texttt{rev}\) su \(\texttt{app}\)), i.e. \[ \forall l_1,l_2 \in L_A .\; \texttt{rev}(\texttt{app}(l_1\; l_2)) = \texttt{app}(\texttt{rev}(l_2), \texttt{rev}(l_1\;)) \]

theorem.coq: Theorem rev_app : forall l1 l2 : list , rev(app l1 l2) = app (rev l2) (rev l1).
